title: Oogiri
description:
A collection of nine short stories written by NisiOisin with the collaboration of nine different artists:

[b]Musumeiri Hako (Girl in a Box)[/b] - Artist: [url=https://mangadex.org/?page=search&artist=Akatsuki%20Akira]Akatsuki Akira[/url]
A delinquent finds a girl abandoned in a box... and takes her home...

[b]RKD-EK9[/b] - Artist: [url=https://mangadex.org/?page=search&artist=Obata%20Takeshi]Obata Takeshi[/url]
In future scientists found that heaven exists but you need to do a certain amount of good deeds in order to get there. So what happens with people, who don't have enough of them?

[b]Nani Made Nara Koroseru?[/b] [i](How Far Can You Kill?)[/i] - Artist: [url=https://mangadex.org/?page=search&artist=Ikeda%20Akihisa]Ikeda Akihisa[/url]
Reika asked her neighbour friend Kyuu "how far could he kill?" when they were playing in sandpit. After that coversation they driffted apart. Ten years later Kyuu meets Reika carring a big box. She told him, it's dog corpse.

[b]Hanger Strike![/b] - Artist: [url=https://mangadex.org/?page=search&artist=Fukushima%20Teppei]Fukushima Teppei[/url]

[b]Koi Aru Doguya[/b] - Artist: [url=https://mangadex.org/?page=search&artist=Yamakawa%20Aiji]Yamakawa Aiji[/url]
Bad boy Shimane felt in love with a good student Yokoi Shuu. To get her love, he has spent all his money on a magic ring that is supposed to make her fall in love with him. But there is a trick if she won't accept it. Now that he has the ring, what will he do?

[b]Offside o Oshiete[/b] [i](Teach Me the Offside)[/i] - Artist: [url=https://mangadex.org/?page=search&artist=Nakayama%20Atsushi]Nakayama Atsushi[/url]
High-school student Itou tries to cope with the disbanding of the soccer club when a girl asks him to explain the offside rule to her.

[b]Doushitemo Kanaetai Tatta Hitotsu no Negai to Wari to Sou demo Nai 99 no Negai[/b] [i](The One Wish That He Wants Granted No Matter What, and the Ninety-Nine That He Doesn’t)[/i] - Artist: [url=https://mangadex.org/?page=search&artist=Nakamura%20Hikaru]Nakamura Hikaru[/url]

[b]Bokura wa Zatsu ni wa Manabanai[/b] - Artist: [url=https://mangadex.org/?page=search&artist=Kawashita%20Mizuki]Kawashita Mizuki[/url]

[b]Tomodachi Inai Doumei[/b] - Artist: [url=https://mangadex.org/?page=search&artist=Kindaichi%20Renjuurou]Kindaichi Renjuurou[/url]
